More good news from gamedev.net:

ATI announces OpenGL ES chip for cellphones
Posted by: opengl.org webmaster at 14:51
ATI announced their IMAGEON 2300 chip for cell phones which will offer
OpenGL ES-hardware accelerated 3D graphics and gaming.
